short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to download pdfs when no download link is avaliable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow students with access to the "Universidade de Coimbra" InforStudante platform, to download pdfs when only displayed in the embedded pdf viewer.
